nodes.notes:
Edit Element object field to now contain image location url. In OpenAI's case, 

current contend id folder/current package deliverable folder/intermediate production assets folder

nodes.name: Switch: KIE.AI (task_id.successFlag)
nodes.notes:
Status Descriptions (kie.ai video gen tasks only):

0: Generating - Task is currently being processed
1: Success - Task completed successfully
2: Failed - Task generation failed
3: Generation Failed - Task created successfully but generation failed

source: https://docs.kie.ai/veo3-api/get-veo-3-video-details

Element.internal_use_only_element_description: this is the ai agent/workflow context dump of element generation and stuff
Element.generation_of_video_sound_prompt: Soft rustling of delicate feathers in gentle breeze, subtle whisper-like sounds, organic texture with slight variation in intensity, peaceful and mesmerizing audio that matches the visual shimmer
Element.video_generation_prompt: Close-up macro shot of iridescent bird feathers catching golden hour sunlight, gentle breeze causing subtle movement and shimmer. Shallow depth of field with bokeh background of forest canopy. Cinematic color grading with warm amber and teal tones. Shot transitions from extreme close-up to slight pull-back revealing feather texture details. 4K quality, smooth camera movement, dreamy atmospheric lighting.
